amendment.description: To require notice to Congress and the public on earmarks of funds available to the Department of Defense.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4370 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 4370 proposed by Senator Coburn. (consideration: CR S6374, S6376; text: CR S6374) To require notice to Congress and the public on earmarks of funds available to the Department of Defense.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4370 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4370 proposed by Senator Coburn.
